name: GetFreshserviceAgents
description:
Retrieve a list of all Agents in Freshservice.

Use this tool to get a comprehensive list of all agents currently active in Freshservice, useful for administrative and reporting purposes.

parameters.name: entries_per_page
parameters.description: The number of agent entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list. Useful for controlling the size of paginated results.

value_schema.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list.

parameters.name: page_number_to_retrieve
parameters.description: The specific page number of the agent list to retrieve.

parameters.name: requester_email
parameters.description: The email address of the requester for which the corresponding agent needs to be listed.

value_schema.description: The email address for which the corresponding requester needs to be listed.

parameters.name: filter_by_mobile_phone_number
parameters.description: Filter agents by a specific mobile phone number to list the corresponding requesters.

value_schema.description: The mobile phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: filter_by_work_phone_number
parameters.description: Work phone number to filter the list of agents by their corresponding requesters.

value_schema.description: The work phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: agent_type
parameters.description: Filter agents by employment type: 'fulltime' or 'occasional'.

value_schema.description: Signifies whether the agents to be listed are full-time agents or occasional agents. Supports two possible values - fulltime, occasional.

parameters.name: agent_query_filter
parameters.description: URL-encoded string for filtering agents. Supports parameters like first_name, last_name, job_title, email, etc.

value_schema.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of agents. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
first_name, last_name, job_title, email, work_phone_number, mobile_phone_number, department_id, reporting_manager_id, time_zone, language, location_id, created_at, updated_at, (all custom fields).
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/agents?query="job_titile:'HR Manager' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"

parameters.name: filter_active_users
parameters.description: Set to true to list active accounts, false to list deactivated ones, or omit to include both.

value_schema.description: Signifies if the user accounts to be listed are active (true), or have been deactivated. Not applying this filter returns both active and deactivated accounts.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list.

value_schema.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address for which the corresponding requester needs to be listed.

value_schema.description: The email address for which the corresponding requester needs to be listed.

parameters.name: mobile_phone_number
parameters.description: The mobile phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

value_schema.description: The mobile phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: work_phone_number
parameters.description: The work phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

value_schema.description: The work phone number for which the corresponding requesters need to be listed.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Signifies whether the agents to be listed are full-time agents or occasional agents. Supports two possible values - fulltime, occasional.

value_schema.description: Signifies whether the agents to be listed are full-time agents or occasional agents. Supports two possible values - fulltime, occasional.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Signifies if the user accounts to be listed are active (true), or have been deactivated. Not applying this filter returns both active and deactivated accounts.

value_schema.description: Signifies if the user accounts to be listed are active (true), or have been deactivated. Not applying this filter returns both active and deactivated accounts.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of agents. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
first_name, last_name, job_title, email, work_phone_number, mobile_phone_number, department_id, reporting_manager_id, time_zone, language, location_id, created_at, updated_at, (all custom fields).
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/agents?query="job_titile:'HR Manager' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"

value_schema.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of agents. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
first_name, last_name, job_title, email, work_phone_number, mobile_phone_number, department_id, reporting_manager_id, time_zone, language, location_id, created_at, updated_at, (all custom fields).
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/agents?query="job_titile:'HR Manager' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"
